content: Comparable owned and leased margins improved to 31.9% in the quarter, up 800 basis points to 2019 levels for the same set of properties, reflecting another quarter of very strong operational execution and an increase in average daily rate of 15% in 2019.  International comparable owned and leased properties accounted for $9 million of adjusted EBITDA growth to 2019, driven by strong results in our European properties namely the Park Hyatt Paris and the Park Hyatt Zurich.
